Reference

Loading UK Biobank data

Make a data dictionary and optionally select columns to read into R

make_data_dict()

Generate a data dictionary from a raw UK Biobank phenotype file

read_pheno()

Read a UK Biobank phenotype file

Extract clinical events data

Reformat diagnoses/operations data fields to aid phenotyping

get_death_data_icd10_diagnoses()

Get death data ICD10 diagnoses

get_self_report_cancer_diagnoses()

Get self-reported cancer diagnoses

get_self_report_non_cancer_diagnoses()

Get self-reported non-cancer diagnoses

get_self_report_non_cancer_diagnoses_icd10()

Get self-reported non-cancer diagnoses (ICD10)

get_hes_icd9_diagnoses()

Get hospital inpatient ICD9 diagnoses

get_hes_icd10_diagnoses()

Get hospital inpatient ICD10 diagnoses

get_cancer_register_icd9_diagnoses()

Get cancer register ICD9 diagnoses

get_cancer_register_icd10_diagnoses()

Get cancer register ICD10 diagnoses

get_all_diagnostic_codes_multi()

Get all diagnostic codes from multiple data sources

extract_first_or_last_clinical_event()

Get the earliest record date for a set of diagnostic codes

Create local data base

Store processed data as a local database

main_dataset_diagnoses_to_sqlite_db()

Write diagnoses to a SQLite database

file_to_sqlite_db()

Write a file to a database

gp_clinical_to_sqlite_db()

Pre-processing function - reformat UK Biobank primary care clinical events data

Clinical codes

Explore and map between clinical coding systems

lookup_codes()

Look up descriptions for clinical codes

search_codes_by_description()

Search for codes that match a description

get_child_codes()

Get child codes for a clinical code type

map_codes()

Map clinical codes from one coding system to another

Phenotype algorithms

Identify phenotypes as per definitions in this package

diabetes_type_first_occurrence()

Ascertain diabetes type from first occurrence fields

diabetes_diagnosis_date_first_occurrence()

Get date of diabetes diagnosis based on first occurrence fields

Summarise row wise

Mainly for summarising continuous variables

ukb_mutate_numerical_means()

Mutate mean values across instances for numerical UKB fields

summarise_rowise()

Summarise a UK Biobank phenotype dataset row-wise

summarise_rowise_numerical_mean_min_max()

Mutate mean/min/max values across instances for numerical UKB fields

rowise_min_max_date()

Get rowise min/max date from UKB dataset

rowise_summary()

Summarise a group of columns row-wise

Utilites

Miscellaneous general utility functions

my_skim()

Quickly summarise a dataframe

ukb_mutate_dob()

Mutate DOB column from a processed UKB df

get_colnames_for_fieldids()

Get descriptive colnames associated with one or more FieldIDs

extract_codings_for_fieldids()

Get UKB codings for one or more FieldIDs

get_ukb_data_dict()

Get UKB data dictionary

get_ukb_codings()

Get UKB codings file

get_ukb_data_dict_direct()

Download UKB data dictionary directly from UKB website

get_ukb_codings_direct()

Download UKB codings file directly from UKB website

get_ukb_code_mappings()

Get UK Biobank clinical code mappings file

make_empty_clinical_codes_list()

Create an empty list to be populated with diagnostic codes

time_taken_message()

Display time taken message

Dummy data

Functions to generate dummy UKB data

download_dummy_ukb_data_to_tempdir()

Download dummy UK Biobank data

Private functions

Helpers

extract_single_diagnostic_code_record_basis()

Extract a single record from a dataframe generated by one of the get_XXX_diagnoses functions (generic)

Convert column for a FieldID to long format

field_id_pivot_longer_multi()

Apply pivot_longer across multiple sets of columns

get_diagnoses_set_index_code_date_cols()

Standardise a long format diagnoses dataframe

Pre-processing function - reformat UK Biobank primary care clinical events data

Package overview

General summary of package contents
